osprey 0.1.0

    • Using Osprey TLGs with teal

Create an AE Overview Summary Table (AET01)

t_ae_oview.Rd

t_ae_oview returns adverse events according to STREAM format AET01

t_ae_oview(id, class, term, dthfl, dcsreas, aesdth, aeser, aeacn, arel, aerel,
  aetoxgr, col_by, total = "All Patients")

Arguments

id

unique subject identifier variable. If a particular subject has no adverse event then the subject id should be listed where class and term should be set to missing (i.e. NA).
class

system organ class variable.
term

preferred term variable.
dthfl

subject death flag variable.
dcsreas

reason for discontinuation from study variable.
aesdth

results in death variable.
aeser

serious event variable.
aeacn

action taken with study treatment variable.
arel

analysis causality variable.
aerel

causality variable.
col_by

group variable that will be used for a column header. col_by has to be a factor and can not be missing.
total

character string that will be used as a label for a column with pooled total population, default here is "All Patients".
atoxgr

analysis toxicity grade variable.

Value

rtable object

Examples

library(dplyr)
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
library(rtables)
#> Warning: package ‘rtables’ was built under R version 3.4.4
library(haven)
adae = read_sas("/opt/bee/home_nas/zhanc107/osprey/adam/adae.sas7bdat")
#> Error: '/opt/bee/home_nas/zhanc107/osprey/adam/adae.sas7bdat' does not exist.

tbl <- t_ae_oview(
   id = adae$USUBJID,
   class = adae$AESOC,
   term = adae$AEDECOD,
   dthfl = adae$DTHFL,
   dcsreas = adae$DCSREAS,
   aesdth = adae$AESDTH,
   aeser = adae$AESER,
   aeacn = adae$AEACN,
   arel = adae$AREL,
   aerel = adae$AEREL,
   aetoxgr = adae$AETOXGR,
   col_by = factor(adae$ARM),
   total="All Patients"
)
#> Error in check_col_by(col_by, min_num_levels = 1): could not find function "check_col_by"

tbl
#> function (src, ...) 
#> {
#>     UseMethod("tbl")
#> }
